page.title: 14SUDELEY- VISITORS' GUIDE Pt1
page.content: Visitors to Sudeley can see many interesting rooms:- { {**Rent Room-}contains all the Dent Family rent books.Entries would be written using a quill pen;books were kept for rent due on Lady Day, Michaelmas and Mayday. Rent would be paid in corn. { {**North Room-}this dining room holds several blackjcks that would have held ale or water.In the middle of the room there is a chair bearing the words"Rest Thyself".In the fireplace 4 cannon balls. { {**Bedrooms-}The guest room contains a fourposter bed and a long hotwater bottle.On the floor, Emma Dent's wedding dress and veil. (7)
